text:
Dame Catherine Winifred Harcourt (née Fulton, born 16 June 1927), known professionally as Kate Harcourt, is a New Zealand actress. She is known as host of the Wellington version of children's show "Junior Magazine." Over her long career she has worked in comedy as well as drama on stage, movies and television.
In the 1996 New Year Honours, Harcourt was appointed as a Dame Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit for her works to theatre.

annotations.surface_form: Dame Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit
